Assault Rifle.special: May re-roll one Blank result during a Ranged Attack action, Two Handed

Great Weapon.special: Pierce Results can’t be canceled, Two-Handed

Improvised Weapon.special: Anything not meant to be a weapon that could still hurt someone - table leg, baseball bat, frying pan, etc

Pistol and Hand Weapon.special: May be used without a Dual Wielding Trait, counts as a single Weapon choice, Two Handed

Polearm.special: May use a Ranged Attack action with a Target # of 2 when within 2” of target but not Engaged in Melee. Roll a Melee Test instead of Ranged Test for this Attack.

Shield.special: Generate 1 Red Die against any Attack targeting this character. May be taken without the Dual Wielding trait

Shotgun.special: At Short Range, Pierce Results can’t be cancelled, Two Handed

SMG.special: May re-roll one Blank Result during a Ranged Attack action

Sword.special: May re-roll one Blank result during a Melee Attack action

Shortbow.special: May re-roll one Die during a Ranged Attack at Short Range, Two Handed

Repeater Crossbow.special: May Re-roll one Die during a Ranged Attack, Two Handed
